description: Numbers that are a sum of 2 distinct nonzero squares in more than one way.
comments: Appears to be n such that sigma(n)==0 (mod 4) and n is expressible as a sum of 2 squares. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 20 2003
links: Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
crossrefs: Cf. A001481, A025303 (exactly 2 ways), A025304 (exactly 3 ways), A025305 (exactly 4 ways), A025306 (exactly 5 ways).
author: _Clark Kimberling_
